title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 171-2.3 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 171-2.3 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Incoming mail. Correspondence mailed to an OCFS resident and received at the
facility. (b) Outgoing mail. Correspondence sent by an OCFS resident to individuals outside of the
facility. (c) Inspection. Screening
of incoming or outgoing mail that does not include reading the
contents. (d) Immediate family
member. The mother, father, sister, brother, grandparent, spouse or child of
the resident. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
171-2.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
